title: Gold Edges Lower as Traders Lock In Gains Above $5,000 an Ounce
description: Gold slipped, as traders booked profits after mild US inflation data pushed the metal back above $5,000 an ounce.
content: Gold slipped, as traders booked profits after mild US inflation data pushed the metal back above $5,000 an ounce.
